title: Fr. Damian Ference - Suffering [audio presentation]
description:
Fr. Damian Ference - Suffering [audio presentation]

Presented by Lighthouse Catholic Youth: Fr. Damian Ference, popular Catholic writer, speaker, and professor at Borromeo College Seminary in Cleveland, shares his insights into the mystery of suffering. With moving personal stories and inspiring conviction, Fr. Damian reveals the depth of divine love as shown by his willingness to embrace the very human experience of suffering.

Length: 30:05
Filetype: MP3
 
https://www.lighthousecatholicmedia.org/store/title/suffering
